subproject.corporate outcome: Development plans and programmes integrate environmentally sustainable solutions in a manner that promotes poverty reduction, MDG achievement and low-emission climate-resilient development
subproject.description: Improved energy performance codes. Improved enforcement of mandatory energy efficiency building codes. Pilot projects utilizing an integrated design approach. Promotion of best energy design and building practices in construction sector. Monitoring of building energy consumption and GHG emissions.
subproject.title: ENERGY EFFICIENCY IN BUILDINGS
